markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 6" pfs="Standard">
[Speaking Sky](/Spells.aspx?ID=824)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 225, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 79

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

The air speaks to you. You can [precisely](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) sense any motion within 60 feet through vibration and air movement.
name: Speaking Sky
